channel.title: [REQ] Good Source and Client
channel.description:
Before I go anywhere with this post I would first like to say I have looked through so many threads, searched through pages and pages on google, I cannot find a good source and client that suites what I am looking for and was wondering if anyone on here could help me out.
Okay now to the point, I am looking for a good source and client that's not totally loaded with customs etc, I would like to find one that has fully working skilling, a good combat system, and most npcs where they belong. I also was hoping to find one that had Vesta, Chaotics, and Nex Gear.
Any help would be greatly appreciated, please don't flame me. :p

item.title: [REQ] Good Source and Client
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

A PI would be what you’re looking for, something like TrisidiaX?

Read full topic
